author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 3-year-old girl was killed when a portion of the cement plaster fell off the ceiling in her house at Veerapandian village near Panagudi on Tuesday night.

Police said that S. Krithika (3) was playing in her house along with her grandfather Vellaiyan even as her parents Senthilkumar and Jaya Subhi were sitting at a distance. Suddenly, a portion of the cement plaster in the ceiling fell on the baby and her grandfather. Krithika, who sustained a grievous head injury, died on the spot, and Vellaiyan suffered an injury on the leg.

The girl’s body was sent to Kanyakumari Medical College Hospital at Aasaripallam in Nagercoil for post-mortem.

Panagudi police have registered a case.
title: 3-year-old killed as ceiling plaster falls off
